channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Pritzker Gets Caught in Hot Mic Moment Talking About Biden Mess As More Trouble Arises
South Korea preparing 'StarWars' laser defense system to take out North Korean drones
item.description: South Korean military officials claim lasers composed of sustained, concentrated light beams used to overheat aerial targets are forthcoming at the Demilitarized Zone border with North Korea.

item.title: Pollsters Warn Democrats 'Solid Blue Wall' Is Crumbling
item.description: Pollsters and pundits on both sides of the political aisle say the "blue wall" Democrats are counting on to stop Donald Trump appears to be teetering on the verge of collapse.

item.title: Biden's Weird Greeting of British PM Starmer and Befuddled NATO Dinner Remarks
Huge majority of Democrats say Biden must step aside even as Biden-Trump horse race is tied: poll
item.description: President Biden is facing a confidence crisis among his own party, with 67% of Democrats saying he should drop out of the presidential race.

item.title: NATO to Back Ukraine as Biden Faces Calls to Drop Out
item.description: NATO leaders will end their summit Thursday with a clear focus on backing Ukraine and countering what the allies say is the growing threat Russia poses to Europe, as U.S. President Joe Biden faces growing calls from members of his Democratic Party to drop out.

item.title: Dave Portnoy Lights Up George Clooney: If Biden Was So Far Gone—Why'd You Wait 3 Weeks to Tell Us?
Trump says VP shortlist Doug Burgum's signing of near-total abortion ban is 'an issue'
item.description: Former President Donald Trump said Wednesday that Gov. Doug Burgum's pro-life measures in North Dakota are "a little bit of an issue" when considering him for vice-president.

item.title: Rep. Jason Smith to Newsmax: DOJ Must Probe Hamas-Linked US Nonprofit
item.description: Rep. Jason Smith, R-Mo., chair of the House Ways and Means Committee, told Newsmax on Wednesday about efforts to have the Department of Justice (DOJ) investigate a U.S.-based nonprofit linked to a Hamas affiliate who held Israelis hostage in the Gaza Strip.

item.title: Biden's Fundraising Falls Over a Cliff: 'Disastrous,' 'the Money Has Absolutely Shut off'
Trump campaign rips 'fear-mongering' Dem strategy linking him to Project 2025 after Biden's disastrous debate
item.description: Former President Trump's campaign is pushing back on Democrat attacks centered around a conservative think tank's policy agenda promoting policies for a GOP presidency.

item.title: Sen. Fetterman 'Strongly Disagrees' With Sen. Welch on Biden
item.description: Sen. John Fetterman, D-Pa., is sticking by President Joe Biden following a public statement by fellow Democrat Peter Welch of Vermont, who called on the president to step aside in his bid for reelection.

item.title: Ezra Klein Manages to Implode the Democrats' Narrative That Trump Is a 'Threat to Democracy'
Democrats increasingly worried about Biden's 'cratering' fundraising: report
item.description: President Biden's donor class is drying up in the wake of his disastrous debate performance, with donors refusing to contribute to his flailing campaign.

item.title: Trump Jr. to Newsmax: Credit Dad for Staying Mum as Dems Implode
item.description: Former President Donald Trump should be commended for staying out of the fray while Democrats were imploding over the prospects of President Joe Biden’s reelection in November, Donald Trump Jr. told Newsmax on Wednesday.
